about_the_game:
Transform the look of your favourite animals in Meadow! This pack contains two skins: one Peacock skin for the Pheasant and one Scarlet Macaw skin for the Eagle.

Did you know that all peacocks are male? It makes sense when you think about it, but we’re so used to talking about peacocks as if they’re a species of bird rather than the males of one. The collective name is peafowl, the females are called peahens and the babies are peachicks. In Meadow, however, you can be a female peacock if you so wish. Who’s going to stop you?

The scarlet macaw is a gorgeous kind of parrot that you might envision sitting on the shoulder of an archetypal pirate. In the wild, their life span is 40-50 years on average, but they’ve been known to live up to a staggering 90 years in captivity! The scarlet macaw is easily identified by its vibrant red body and the strikingly blue wings and is probably what most of us imagine when we hear the word parrot. And that beak is not a joke, as it can snap a broomstick in half, allegedly. Not putting my finger in there, that’s for sure. Not to worry though, there’s no biting allowed in Meadow.
